item.description:
Hi Everyone...

Since I received such positive feedback about our 2nd early dinner and cocktails at the Gaslight, how about a return visit on Sunday June 21st? The Gaslight is a great place and there's plenty of free parking.

The Gaslight usually turns out to be a classic/memorable night out that people talk about for weeks.

Cocktail @ 5:30PM and dinner @ 6:30PM at:

Gaslight, Brasserie du Coin
560 Harrison Ave
Boston, MA 02118
(617) 422-0224
Price: Reasonable
www.gaslight560.com (check them out on the web)

Gaslight, Brasserie du Coin, (literally brasserie on the corner) is The Aquitaine Groupâ€™s classic neighborhood Parisian brasserie.

I hope to see you at Gaslight!

Cheers,
Michael

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Return to the Gaslight? An Early Dinner - French cuisine in the South End
